dataAck.title: Data Acknowledgement
dataAck.body1: The data on our site is publicly available and is obtained from a variety of official government sources. A full list of acknowledgements is found below.
dataAck.source1: © State of New South Wales NSW Ministry of Health. For current information go to
dataAck.source2: © The State of Queensland (Queensland Health) at
dataAck.source3: The Government of South Australia, SA Health at
dataAck.source4: Australian Capital Territory Government, ACT Health at
dataAck.source6: Victoria State Government, Department of Health and Human Services at
dataAck.source8: Government of Western Australia, Department of Health at
dataAck.body2: We are not affiliated with, nor endorsed by these organisations in any way. We are a volunteer team and we use the data we collect strictly for non-commercial, educational, reporting and research purposes. Care is taken to ensure the data is accurate and not reframed or misrepresented.
dataAck.body3: We strongly recommend that users of this website adhere to the advice and regulations provided by their respective local and federal governments and authorities.
dataAck.body4: If you have concerns, please contact us through our

status.title: Status
status.note: Time in AEST, last updated at:

caseByState.title: Case by State
caseByState.append1: * We currently do not have a consistent source of data for recovered cases in NSW. The total recovered data is based on gov report.

hospitalCaseMap.title: Hospital & Case Map
hospitalCaseMap.note1: *City-level data is only present for ACT,NSW,VIC and WA, HHS Data for QLD. Other states are being worked on.

chartCommon.dottedLine: *Dotted line indicates no new data was obtained

globalChart.title: Global Comparison
globalChart.append0: *Each data point on the Y-axis is the total number of new confirmed cases in the past 7 days.
globalChart.append3: for a detailed explanation on this graph!
